shortdesc.ph: Sets the local voice reverberation option, including the virtual stereo.
Sets the local voice reverberation option, including the virtual stereo.

dlentry.dd: This method is deprecated as of v2.4.0. We recommend using [2/2] to start an audio call test. This method is deprecated as of v2.4.0.

section.p: This method sets the local voice reverberation for users in a `COMMUNICATION` channel or hosts in a `LIVE_BROADCASTING` channel. This method sets the local voice reverberation for users in a `COMMUNICATION` channel or hosts in a `LIVE_BROADCASTING` channel. After successfully calling this method, all users in the channel can hear the voice with reverberation. After successfully calling this method, all users in the channel can hear the voice with reverberation.

ul.li: 当使用以 AUDIO_REVERB_FX 为前缀的枚举值时，请确保在调用该方法前将 的 profile 参数设置为 (4) 或 (5) ，否则该方法设置无效。 When using the enumeration value prefixed with AUDIO_REVERB_FX, please make sure to set the profile parameter to (4) or (5) before calling this method, otherwise the method setting is invalid.

To achieve better audio effect quality, Agora recommends calling and setting the profile parameter to (4) or (5) before setting this enumerator. When using, Agora recommends to set the profile parameter to (5) before calling this method.

This method works best with the human voice, and Agora does not recommend using it for audio containing music and a human voice. This method works best with the human voice, and Agora does not recommend using it for audio containing music and a human voice.

This method cannot be used together with the method, otherwise the method adjusted first will not take effect. This method cannot be used together with the method, otherwise the method adjusted first will not take effect. For detailed considerations, see the advanced guide Voice Changer and Reverberation. For detailed considerations, see the advanced guide Voice Changer and Reverberation.
You can call this method either before or after joining a channel. You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

pd.p: 本地语音混响选项，默认值为 ，即原声。 The local voice reverb option, the default value is, which is the original sound. Relevant links: Relevant links:

To implement better voice effects, Agora recommends enumerations with AUDIO_REVERB_FX as the prefix. To implement better voice effects, Agora recommends enumerations with AUDIO_REVERB_FX as the prefix.
